author: Home Repair Tutor
description: How to remove an old toilet flange…I’m using the flange hub to make a straight cut. Then I deburr it using a utility knife and place an Oatey 3 inch gripper plug inside the pipe. This prevents sewer gas from entering the home. I always try to have multiple gripper plugs in different sizes 🔥#plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: How to Remove an Old Toilet Flange - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
